categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Hound" was the nickname of an Advanced Recon Force Scout Trooper sergeant who served in the Coruscant Guard of the Grand Army of the Republic during the Clone Wars. During the hunt for the fugitive Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano, Hound utilized his tracking massiff Grizzer in order to track her by scent. He wore ARF trooper armor that had red markings.
